meanings.sent1: The banana became mushier as it ripened.
meanings.sent2: The wet paper towel felt mushier than the dry one.
meanings.sent3: She laughed as the mushier fruits squished in her hand.
meanings.sent4: The snow turned mushier under the warm sun.
meanings.sent5: The overripe tomato was so mushier that it burst when touched.

meanings.sent1: The movie's ending was mushier than I expected.
meanings.sent2: She always gets mushier during romantic movies.
meanings.sent3: His mushier reaction to the puppy video made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The love letter was so mushier it made her cry.
meanings.sent5: Her mushier side comes out when she listens to sad songs.
